bibl.title: P. Berlin 6848, A Roman Period Temple Inventory.
Res severa verum gaudium. Festschrift für Karl-Theodor Zauzich zum 65. Geburtstag am 8. Juni 2004
bibl.author: DOUSA, Thomas

bibl.note: Edition of P. Berol. dem. Inv. 6848 = P. dem. Zauzich 12. Dime / Soknopaiu Nesos, reign of Domitian or Trajan? - See pp. 188-189: comparison with col. i of P. Bacchias 1. - Pp. 196-206: Appendix. List of items found in temple inventories (Demotic and Greek); 206-222: Bibliography.
DOUSA Thomas, François GAUDARD and Janed H. THOMPSON, P. Berlin 6848, A Roman Period Temple Inventory.
F. HOFFMANN und H.J. THISSEN (Hgg.), Res severa verum gaudium. Festschrift für Karl-Theodor Zauzich zum 65. Geburtstag am 8. Juni 2004 = Studia Demotica. 6 (Leuven, 2004) pp. 139-222 et pll. XV-XVI.
